name: Banana Cacao Muffins
author: Emily Wong
summary: This recipe is super simple and super health-conscious, but it tastes delicious and is great for breakfast and snacks on the go!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon chia seeds, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners
Add cacao powder; mix until batter is well combined
Fill each cupcake liner with 1 ice cream scoopful of batter
Sprinkle a pinch of chia seeds on top of each muffin
Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, 11 to 13 minutes
Cool on a rack for about 2 minutes
